parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>a3</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Forces the behavior of waypoint, disables AUTOCOMBAT.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint [[setWaypointForceBehaviour]] state

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Waypoint]] - format [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[Group]], ''index'']
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]] - Force or not

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[grp, 2] [[setWaypointForceBehaviour]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[waypointForceBehaviour]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[waypointBehaviour]], [[Mission_Editor:_Waypoints#Behaviour|Behaviour Description]]
</value></part></template>
